Getting Started¶

PySAR does not currently support Python 3.

Download¶

$ git clone from somewhere

Installation¶

$ [sudo] python setup.py install

Requirements¶

  • Numpy 1.6 or newer
  • Scipy 1.10 or newer
  • Matplotlib

Optional packages¶

  • netcdf4-python
  • h5py
  • gdal for python
